page.title: 15Cinema in St. Andrews
page.content: There is only one cinema in St. Andrews.It is situated in North Street and is called{The New Picture House.} It has two cinemas called Cinema One and Cinema Two.Cinema One has 360 seats and Cinema Two has 100 seats.New releases are shown in Cinema One. These are shown later on Video Film in Cinema Two.The admission charges are Â£1 for a child and between Â£1.50 and Â£2 for an adult. The programmes are advertised in the local newspapers. The New Picture House also has a shop which sells refreshments before and during the performances.
